src.image.modify.rename module¶

class src.image.modify.rename.Rename(img_name)¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QDialog, src.image.modify.rename.RenameUI

The Rename class implements an image rename dialog.

accept_changes()¶

Accept changed image name to the original one.

class src.image.modify.rename.RenameUI¶

Bases: object

Build UI for rename.Rename.

init_ui(rename)¶

Create user interface for rename.Rename.

The method creates the widget objects in the proper containers and assigns the object names to them.

Parameters

rename (rename.Rename) – The dialog rename window
